steps.name: Start Signup Flow
Click on Continue Button
Verifying element presence: Continue Button
Verify that the Clicking is done on Continue button on Onboarding screen
Select English Language
Verifying element presence: Choose Language Dialogue
Verify that the Clicking is done on  'Continue in English' on Onboarding screen
Enter Mobile Number
Verifying element presence: Mobile Number Field
Verify that the entered text is -->7290010854
Select Checkbox and Request OTP
Verifying element presence: CheckBox Field
Verify that the Clicking is done on CheckBox option tapped
Verifying element presence: Get OTP Button
Verify that the Clicking is done on Get OTP Button
Enter and Confirm OTP
Verify that the entered text is -->4
Verify that the entered text is -->3
Verify that the entered text is -->2
Verify that the entered text is -->1
Verifying element presence: Confirmation Button Found
Verify that the Clicking is done on Confirmation Button clicked
Handle Snackbar if Present
Verifying element presence: Snackbar message appeared: Something went wrong. Please try again after sometime
Verifying element presence: Snackbar element wait
Set MPIN (Fresh Users)
Accept Terms & Conditions
Verifying element presence: TnC Dialogue
Verify that the Clicking is done on I Accept Button on T&C dialogue
